vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.11;
son of: Eliphaz (H0464);
brother of: Teman (H8487), Omar (H0201), Gatam (H1609), Kenaz (H7073), Amalek (H6002H) and Korah (H7141H)
§ Zepho or Zephi = "watch-tower"
son of Eliphaz and grandson of Esau and one of the chiefs of the Edomites
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Elifaz, hijo de Esaú
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
洗玻 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "望樓"
以利法的兒子, 以掃的孫子, 以東族長之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
洗玻 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "望楼"
以利法的儿子, 以扫的孙子, 以东族长之一
